src:
William PSI Disebut Melanggar Etika, BK DPRD Rapat Siang Ini
05 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Imam Hamdi, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI akan menindaklanjuti laporan dugaan pelanggaran etika anggota Fraksi PSI DKI William Aditya Sarana yang kerap disapa William PSI.
Ketua Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI Jakarta Achmad Nawawi mengatakan telah menerima laporan seorang warga Jakarta tentang William berkaitan dengan pengungkapan anggaran janggal DKI.
"Nanti siang kami akan rapatkan dengan seluruh anggota Badan Kehormatan untuk membahas laporan itu," kata Nawawi saat ditemui di DPRD DKI, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Warga Jakarta bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan William ke BK DPRD kemarin. Ketua Umum LSM Maju Kotanya Bahagia Warganya itu menganggap apa yang dilakukan William melanggar Peraturan DPRD DKI Jakarta Nomor 1 tahun 2014 tentang Tata Tertib DPRD DKI Jakarta.
Sugiyanto, menilai cara William mengunggah usulan anggaran DKI yang janggal melalui media sosial itu melanggar kode etik. "Saya melihat bahwa sepertinya dugaan pelanggaran kode etik dalam menyampaikan pendapat. Tidak memperhatikan tata krama, etika, moral, sopan dan santun," kata Sugiyanto saat dihubungi, Senin malam, 4 November 2019.
Nawawi menuturkan seluruh perwakilan dari sembilan fraksi di DPRD DKI bakal mengikuti rapat siang ini. Dugaan pelanggaran etik tersebut bakal dibahas dengan seluruh perwakilan fraksi termasuk PSI.
Adapun hasil putusan rapat terkait dugaan adanya pelanggaran atau tidak bakal diserahkan ke pimpinan legislator DKI. Sebab, kata dia, BK hanya mempunyai kewajiban untuk memberikan rekomendasi hasil rapat ke pimpinan dewan. "Nanti pimpinan dewan yang memutuskan," ujarnya.
Menurut Nawawi, semstinya William memang tidak membuka langsung anggaran janggal melalui media sosial. Sebab, William bisa langsung memanggil atau menghubungi eksekutif untuk mempertahankan langsung temuannya terkait dengan anggaran itu. "Karena posisi legislatif dengan gubernur DKI setara. Jadi sebenarnya bisa memanggil atau menghubungi langsung," ujarnya.
Ketua Badan Kehormatan DPRD DKI itu menjelaskan anggaran janggal yang disampaikan William PSI belum final karena masih harus melewati pembahasan antara eksekutif dan dewan melalui komisi-komisi DPRD. "Ini kan masih rancangan, mestinya belum dibuka. Bahkan, hingga jumpa pers."
text:
William PSI Called Violating Ethics, BK DPRD Meeting This Afternoon
05 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Imam Hamdi, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Body will follow up on reports of alleged ethical violations of members of the DKI PSI Faction, William Aditya Sarana, often called William PSI.
Head of DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Body Achmad Nawawi said he had received a report from a Jakarta resident about William relating to the disclosure of the DKI's odd budget.
"Later in the afternoon we will have a meeting with all members of the Honorary Board to discuss the report," Nawawi said when met at the DKI DPRD, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
A Jakarta resident named Sugiyanto reported William to the DPRD Council yesterday. The Chairperson of the Forward NGOs of the City was Happy His Citizens considered what William was doing violated the DKI Jakarta DPRD Regulation No. 1 of 2014 concerning the Standing Orders of the DKI Jakarta DPRD.
Sugiyanto, assessed that the way William uploaded the awkward DKI budget proposal through social media violated the code of ethics. "I see that it seems that the alleged violation of the code of ethics in expressing opinions. Not paying attention to manners, ethics, morals, courtesy and courtesy," said Sugiyanto when contacted, Monday night, November 4, 2019.
Nawawi said that all representatives from the nine factions in the DKI DPRD will take part in the meeting this afternoon. The alleged violation of ethics will be discussed with all faction representatives including PSI.
The results of the meeting decision related to the alleged violation or will not be submitted to the leadership of the legislator DKI. Because, he said, BK only had the obligation to provide recommendations on the results of the meeting to the leadership of the board. "Later the leadership of the board decides," he said.
According to Nawawi, it seems that William did not open the odd budget directly through social media. Because, William can directly call or contact the executive to directly defend his findings related to the budget. "Because the legislative position with the governor of DKI is equal. So it can actually call or contact directly," he said.
The Chairman of the DKI DPRD Honorary Body explained that the awkward budget submitted by William PSI was not final because it still had to go through discussions between the executive and the council through DPRD commissions. "This is still a draft, it should not be opened. In fact, until the press conference."
